text: You’re greeted by a nurse whose vibe is somewhere between DMV employee and sleep-deprived cryptid.
She glances at your chart and says, 'You don’t *look* that sick.'
You try to decide if it’s worth blowing up now or saving your energy for the next horror.

choices.text: 🧃 Ask for a vomit bag and an outlet. Try being civil.
🧨 Snap back with sarcasm — see if that gets you a bed or a security escort.
🥲 Quietly crumble and text your partner: 'I can’t do this.'
